content.detailedDescription:
I'm from winnipeg, manitoba.  tonight, wed. january 20, 2010 around 1 am central time, i saw a line of light about an inch long in the sky above my apartment building bast the clouds.  it interested me because it was a straight line of light too far to be a reflection.  i initially mistook it for a comet.  after thinking about it i went back out to see if it was still there.  it had dimmed, but also brightened as i looked at it.  so i came inside to get a camera to see if anything would appear on film.  after it flashed, the light in the sky got really bright, and a distinct shape appeared.  along the shape, another light flashed at me.  next thing i know there is a new star in the sky.
 
i'm writing to document, not to be a crack or quack.  i'm serious about what i saw and it really shook me.  i know mufon investegates this sort of thing, but am only letting you know because you are the experts in this sort of thing.  if anything shows up on film, which i highly doubt, i will be sure to let you know.

this thing really shook me and made me feel like something out there responded to my actions that was beyond just being human.  too intense to describe.
content.summary: I flashed at it, it flashed back at me.

content.detailedDescription: At the time my dad was in charge of security, and fire fighting on the naval base in kauai hawaii. barking sands naval base. at the time i was in school in the town of kekaha, kauai. we was called out of class to observe humpback whales spouting out near the boey. i observed a flash out of the corner of my eye towards the direction of barking sands naval base. beings my dad was in charge of security of the base, i especially took note of the flashing. normally that would not be abnormal to see activity beings it is a naval base, but somethign about this struck me wrong. i waited till dad got off work to question him as to what happened. he got home at about 16:30 or so, and i immediatelly questioned him about the activity. at first he remained hesitant about what happened. after much prying i was informed from him that at that time a u.F.O. had appeared between the islands of kauai, and nijiau.The object showed up on radar and immediatelly contact was attempted through radio to no avail. upon no response the base commander dispatched 3-f 14 tomcats to intercept . the f-14s formed a triangle around the object, one on top, another on the side starboard side, and one port side of the object. they then started forcing the ufo down towards the water in the attempt to make it surrender or communicate, to no avail. finaly they forced it down in the channel between the 2 islands to which it sank to the bottom of the sea in about 12,000 feet of water. interestlly enough about 3 days later a soviet salvage vessel showed up and tried to (drag) the bottom of the sea to snag the ufo. it was unable to get it, and recieved offical protests from the united states government, due to the proxemity to u.S. territorial waters. besides this i dont know anythingmore about the occurance.   i will though  say i know more about other occurances, personally, and from my dad on other military contracts. i am former u.S.N. honorablly discharged, and believe in homeland security, absolutelly. this particualar incident occured a long time ago and no classified material was disclosed. i have personally seen 2 u.F.Os in my life and my mother has seen one, up close and personal. literally withing 20 feet or so when she was younger. in her case the u.F.O was cigar shaped and landed in a close by wheat field, near her home at the time. it stayed their for a while and left fast. it fried the wheat clear donw to the ground. my dad was just beggining in the fire fighting field at that time and had access to geiger counters, when he heard what happened, that day after getting home he got a geiger counter and went out to the area of the ufo. the geiger counter was off the scale. the reading was highly radioactive. will submit this for now, i know of more but truthfully i am afraid. my dad is eaten up with cancer atm, and afraid i will cause him trouble , disclosing this info.But i feel i owe it to him atm, he has held this in for a long time so am merelly disclosing it for him, (without his knowledge), thanks :)
content.summary: Disc object moving side to side flashing rapidlly

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down the entrance road to a campground on clearwater lake about nine pm (in the dark) when a red orange sphere came out of the woods ahead of us to our right about seventy five feet ahead. it was about the size of a volleyball floating about five feet off the ground.  it came out of the woods ahead of us floating across a clear grassy area of about forty feet in width at a right angle to the woodline then turned and came toward our car as we approached it, following a wavy path. as it approached the car it rose slightly and came up over the drivers side front fender, glowing brightly, and passed by my open window within five feet of my head at eye level. i looked directly at it but could see no surface detail at all, only the bright glow. it passed my window and i jerked my head around to watch where it went and it continued the same wavy motion following the road behind me from whence i came, continuing on, following the road until it went around a curve out of our sight.  there was no sound at all. i estimate the speed it was traveling to be about twenty five miles an hour, which was about the speed i was moving.  we were quite amazed as that area was well known at the time for ufo sightings and we had just witnessed one in a "small" way.  my wife was with me and will attest to everything i've stated.
content.summary: Red orange orb flew out of woods across hood of my car

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were sitting on the porch smoking at approx 1:30 am when i noticed a large glowing circle moving across the night sky in a curving motion. the thing that brought it to my attention was its blazing orange color. we doubted its existence as a plane due to the fact that there were no faa blinkers on it. a couple of seconds after i had drawn my roommates attention to the strange object we watched as the object turned on a dime and started heading into the opposite direction. after a few more seconds of curving movemnent, we watched as the orange orb shaped phenomena go from moving slowly to an acceleration of insane proportions. as it was accelerating we noticed that it left a very visible, very distinct red and blue streak in its trail. we both looked at each other and figured out that theres no such things as shared delusions and we both vouched for its presence. to be honest i felt very scared when i saw the object because ihad never seen such a strange object in the sky. unfortunatley i was unable to get a photo due to the random appearance of the object and the incredible speed that it was accelerating to. i also felt almost an aura like haze coming off the treeline as i was viewing the object
content.summary: glowing orange circle random hyper-acceleration

content.detailedDescription:
I took several pictures of the sky because i wanted to see if i could get a good image of the moon and its shadow. in the sky i did not see the image that appeared in the photos with my naked eye, neither did my daughter,in fact at that time, the sky was crystal clear.I used a cannon rebel xsi digital camera.The reason all the images appear in double or should i say smeared is because the lens was kept open approx. 4 seconds to allow enough light for exposure.The spherical object that appears in two completely different areas( one above right, the other below left) is the only thing that moved considerably.It also has the appearance of a bluish green reflection on its upper side.I would like to know if this is possibly an object in the sky or some sort of digital effect that happens with photos taken in this manner. please email me a response. sorry if i have wasted your time, if in fact i did.

                                                              thank you,
                                                        gregory steenbuck 


                                                   ps. photos are attached in the order they were taken.
content.summary: Ufo showed only on digital photo.

content.detailedDescription: Subject viewed this object at approximately 6:25 pm est, just hanging there, motionless, about 100 ft. over the main street bridge, with no blinking lights, which one would expect to observe with an airplane, or helicopter. i sat at a light on a suburban downtown street, with only moderate traffic, but when i put the window down, there was no audible sound. mind you, i was on a street in the downtown, but this is not a big city, and i would have easily been able to hear if it was a helicopter, or airplane. plus, there's no airport nearby. i decided to investigate farther, and i went around the block, but by then, the object was nowhere to be seen.
content.summary: Large triangular object with three intensely bright white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Moscow, russia. such objects could be observed in the north-east of moscow on jan. 16, 2010. objects were flying from the center, lined up in a right triangle. it took about three minutes, after which all objects are "extinguished",
locations: moscow, st. engineering, 3 
video of the event is here 
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=krjidlnucmk
 hypotheses here >http://translate.Google.Com/translate?Langpair=auto|en&u=http%3a%2f%2fastemir2001.Narod.Ru%2fstate001.Html
content.summary: 3 ufo's over russia form a triangle (january 16, 2010)

content.detailedDescription: I'm a retired chemist living on farm land in south central il.  i watch the sky a lot.  i was a mufon member for a year but didn't think much of walt.  still active in groups.  an object like the slida, co event of 1996 appeared se of my land traveling slowly north.  the sun was over my right shoulder starting to turn orange.  object was very bright white.  at 10,000 ft it would have been the size of a 747 moving at less that 100 miles an hour.  at 40,000 ft it would have been a quarter mile long.  could not tell.  have already talked to gary hart about sighting.
content.summary: Bright luminius disc moving se to ne.

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was captured yesterday 19 jan 2010, 11:28:37 am. an brown color ufo object on the cloud.
please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Brown color ufo

content.detailedDescription:
There is a video of this object....It can be found at the 
fort frances times newspaper website.

google ...Fort frances times online
click the link...Fort frances t.V.
scroll down to.......Ufo in the fort frances area.

please let me know what you think asap.

ps.  i have another incident to disclose at a future time.
content.summary: Glowing light

content.detailedDescription: Outside having a cigarette looking out over the hills behind my house, and suddenly a bright green flying fireball appeared moving quickly as if landing at about a 45 degree angle, did not look organic, was large and absoultely something that could be explained.  we live near pt. mugu
content.summary: Bright green fireball moving quickly as if it were landing at 45 degree angle

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette with friends. my buddy ross pointed it out. i have previously seen a ufo much closer, did research and recognized the similarities. we have had multiple cases of sights of beings in our woods, ufo's and strange noises. we have clear as day seen what we claim to be aliens or extra terrestrials. we have 3 to 5 friends willing to explain there witness after spending nights at our house. people originally thought of us as crazy, then we proved it all to them by showing them. things are going on here, indefinitely and we need someone to come look or read in to it deeper.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Far away, shining red and blue beams, neutral white.

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping with my older brother a few hundred yards past our property boundaries in a small clearing in the woods.  we went to sleep probably around 11:30 or midnight, and i awoke several hours later, noticing an intense blue light with no distinct point of origin filtering in through the white screen of the tent.  the light was accompanied by a strange sound, which i can only describe as pulsating and whirring, similar to guitar feedback. it was not the sound of a boat engine or generator; there were no pistons firing.  you get used to those sounds when you grow up on a boat.  i was unable to move anything besides my eyes, and unable to speak.  from where i was laying on my side, i could see that my brother had also awoken and was also struck by paralysis.  i was overcome by a very strong and instance fear, like nothing else i have ever felt in my life.  neither my brother or myself remember how long this occurrence, and we don't remember falling asleep again, but we awoke in the morning around 7:30 am and walked home.  he also remember this happening and has the same story.
neither of us noticed any adverse affects to our health due to this encounter.
content.summary: Sleeping in a tent, awaking to bright lights and strange sound. paralyzed.

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday the 13th january 2010 i had stepped outside my place of work to have a cigarette.  as i was standing there i looked up at the night sky, which was very clear with a lot of stars being shown.  there's a military airfield near by, and often times at night airplanes can be seen flying over head, and it helps pass the time watching them.  on this particular occasion i had saw what i believed to be just a normal airplane flying over head in the distance, slightly above where orions belt would be. 

what made this object different than any other ones i saw was the rapidly changing color of light.  it had a stark bright white color to it, but you could see it change colors very rapidly (kind of like a flashing led) between red first, blue, and than green.  as i watched this object i saw it clearly go from just moving straight across to going down almost like a slant, following orions belt.  it vanished momentarily, but i could still follow it by the faint flashing light.

it had than made it's stop near a radio tower that stands right across from me. the radio tower has a series of red lights that will flash on and off in order to warn incoming planes.  in this particular case the object which i saw was "standing" near the lowest point of the light, which is rather odd for something that would be an aircraft, not to mention it was just sitting there.

i watched the object for approximately 15 minutes as it just stood there, flashing it's colors very rapidly.  at that point my break was over, and i figured it was just a star, or my mind playing tricks on me, so i headed back inside.

after that night i continued to watch the sky, trying to see if i could find the object again to assure my self that it was in fact a star, how ever i had no such luck spotting it again.

the reason i am just reporting it now is because i wanted to make sure it was not a star, and also because i was listening to a podcast that had reported similar events in other states.
content.summary: Bright object rapidly changing colors.

content.detailedDescription: After hearing linda m howe on coast to coast i went outside in my backyard with binoculars. i looked up and saw a very bright glittering orb and then looked at it with binoculars. it transformed into a moving cord swirling and whirling rapidly in different directions, flashing brilliant light as it moved. after awhile, it stopped moving and transformed back into the sphere and under it you can see a rectangular form with spots of light on it. by naked eye, this looks like a vertical tail below the orb. i have watched these orbs since 6/27 every clear night i can. they are all over the sky in all directions. they cloak major stars and planets and appear in their sky positions. examples are jupiter, mars, betelgeuse, rigel, syrius, middle star in orion belt. the orbs react to my putting attention on them (esp. gratitude/love) by beginning to stir and move. i can see their movement with the naked eye and it appears sometimes to move 1-2 inches back and forth which must be a vast distance in space. they are the size of a star so they are quite a distance away. a cloudy night will hide them so they are higher than the earth's cloud cover. they seem to all be in 3 colors: white, orange or multi rainbow colors.  mars & betelgeuse are orange, rigel is white and syrius is rainbow colored. their light is brighter than the stars and it often flashes, so it catches the eye. i speculate that the rectangular shape below them might be a type of ship.  they all have that configuration.  i live in a small town (6,500) south of i20 near the louisiana border. barksdale afb is approximately 75-100 miles east of here. i have some digital photos of the orbs and even some videos. they are not expert quality as my digital camera has only a 30x zoom and the photos do not capture the beautiful bright light of the orbs. i don't know what type of video camera would be able to photograph them adequately.  i speculate that the forms they take could be hyperspace language (jim sparks & stewart swerdlow websites). i wish i could videotape the movements in order to break it down into frames and study them to see what the sequence of shapes might mean to someone who reads hyperspace. once i was attempting to photograph them and for some reason, the orb did not want me to do so.  my battery would go as soon as i tried to take the first photo.  i went through several batteries and it continued to blow them so i stopped trying. other times, the orb seemed to accept my photographing it and would move and swirl rapidly while i was taping it.  i definitely feel there is a connection when i put my attention on them.  i am very sensitive to energies and i only feel positive energy from them.
content.summary: Bright flashing light with tail by naked eye changed to swirling cord moving in myriad forms

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were sitting on the deck of our house on  sunday morning june 7,2009 when my son looked up in the sky and said " what's that light in the sky ?" i looked up and it took me a minute or so to spot it but there it was, almost overhead. it looked like a star but at that hour of the morning, the sky was much too bright to see a star. there were clouds and they would obscure the object as they passed, but then it would reappear in the same location.
 my wife came out on the deck and noticed my son and i looking up in the sky and asked " what are you two doing ?" we told her we were looking at a ufo. she thought we were nuts but looked up and after we pointed it out , she also saw it. my son went in to the house to get his binoculars while my wife and i continued to watch it.
  when he brought out the binoculars he looked at the obect and the handed me the binoculars to take a look. as i tryed to focus them on the object it vanished. my wife described it as just disappearing into itself. i didn't see it happen but when i couldn't find it with the binoculars, i looked with my naked eyes and the object was gone. it didn't fade away, it vanished in a spilt second.













/
content.summary: Looked like a star but the sky was too bright for it to be one

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting with my family on a hill waiting for some fireworks to begin. i saw the object rise in the direction i was facing. it rose too slowly to be a plane, and too quickly to be a planet (it was cloudy, so it was impossible to see stars anyways) or a fireworks test (the object did not explode after it rose, and it was not rising from the direction from which the fireworks show was supposed to appear). i was at okemos at meridian mall around 8 or 8:30 when the object appeared. at first i thought the object was a plane or maybe a fireworks test, but due to the reasons above i quickly discouraged those options. i felt rather calm during the sighting, but later i was confused because about an hour or so after the object disappeared (fading away) another object rose in exactly the same manner as the first, hovered at the same place in the sky as the first, and disappeared in the same way. after the fireworks show was over, i also saw another orange orb in the sky.
content.summary: Small, orange orb.

content.detailedDescription:
The object was traveling nearly  a direct path that commercial aviation follows on approach to newark airport which is common above our home. we were facing north and this object was moving west to east. typically the commercial aviation  flies at an estimated 9000 feet or sometimes  much lower. i am aware of this  as i used to listen to traffic talking to newark tower on my scanner radio on 118.3 mhz. this object emitted a low hum somewhat like the 60 cycle hum of an electric motor, my son was 11 at the time and we both saw and heard the exact same observation. there were flat, pastel like round lights beneath the triangle at head and each end point then a reddish color at the back. as the object passed away it seemed to  accelerate and climb rapidly then totally disappear in a second or two if that.
i have to add to this report that on thanksgiving night, 1974 traveling home  thru wayne, nj on berdan avenue at approx 10 pm my wife and i observed a flat elongated disc of light passing overhead as we climbed the hill. this object was traveling erratically then shot away at an astounding speed.
no sound was heard as we had windows closed and heat on in car as well as radio. i remember as does my wife as we looked at each other and  asked "did you see that!"

i am a retired engineer and usaf vereran serving 1965-1969. saw all kinds of aircraft. what we witnessed in 74 and 91 was no conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Son and i were on lawn chaire waiting to observe perseid meteor showers when we both noticed a large triangular shape blocking the starfield.

content.detailedDescription:
I just walked out of my parents house (blairstown, nj)into their driveway and notice the pleiades (seven sisters) star cluster and the orion constelation were clear in the night sky.  when i got into my vehicle and departed for home i continued to look out my d/s window up at the stars every few seconds.  when i was on gaisler road approaching millbrook road in hardwick twsp. i noticed three very bright white lights at my 12 o'clock high possition.  these lights had the appearance of the landing lights on a commercial aircraft.  they were in a upside down triangle formation.  i could not tell whether or not they were connected, however they moved together.  there were no visible possition lights or anti-collision lights.  at first, my 19 year aviation background told me it was a commercial aircraft headed in my direction with its landing lights on.  when i realized it seemed to be moving away from my directon i pulled my van over to the right shoulder and rolled down my d/s window to get both a better look and listen.  the object was to my amazement moving away from my possition, like as if it was a commercial aircraft flying backwards!!!  there were several other private/ commercial aircraft in the sky at the same time.  some of these aircraft had landing lights on and all of them had possition lights and anti-collision lights visible.  the object i saw made no sound that i could hear from my location.  in my opinion, this object was in violation of faa regulations.  
     i was not an ultralight, helicopter or blimp due to its higher rate of speed and lack of sound (aircraft can be very difficult to id from the ground, particularly at night). the object was only in view to me for a few seconds.  it was traveling in what appeared to be a line from hardwick twsp. to stillwater twsp.  i do not know how fast or at what altitude the object was. i wanted to follow/chase the object but that was impossible to do. i can not be sure what this object/ aircraft was and this may be a misidentfication on my part. i am a private pilot.  
     no further action taken.
content.summary: 3 bright white lights (like landing lights) in a upside down triangle formation moving away from my location. unknown is object(s) were solid or individual.

content.detailedDescription: incident at indian lake ny, i haven`t seen or spoke with my hunting buddy tony since that year, my life has been alot of great start`s , can`t seem to get things right, now on the down side of life , i find myself going back to that night at camp sight 99 and that missing time... just wanted to share that with someone that know`s..... thank-you dave harmon
content.summary: Cigar shape- city bus long 40`silver red,green lights silent tree top

content.detailedDescription:
First of all.... this isn't much of a sighting. a distant 'light in the sky' doesn't seem too significant.  i am a member and my reason for saying anything about it  is to see if anyone else may have reported anything like what i saw.
i heard from friends that the philly news stations said something about 'sightings' but said it was, i believe, a meteor!
i was lying in bed watching tv. i rolled over. when i roll to my right i can look out my window. i live out in the country. across the street is nothing but open fields.  i look out to the east. there is often a lot of air traffic out there at night. i am often amazed at how some nights looking out, i may see 3 or 4 or even 5 airplanes at any given time.
well, on this wednesday night when i looked out i saw a very bright 'star'.  it was a little larger appearing than any other star. maybe the size a planet sometimes appears.  i can't say how far away it was.... but, it appeared to me to be far away.  it appeared approximately 30 degrees up from the horizon.
it appeared motionless.  i wanted to be certain that it wasn't just a plane. now i was curious.
after a short time it moved quickly 'up'!  it moved up a distance  and then stopped again. then it moved in a zig-zag up and down about 3 or 4 times.  then it did it all over again.  and then.... it just 'went out' it disappeared.  i kept watching but nothing happened.

and..... that's it!
content.summary: White star-like light

content.detailedDescription: My children were on our porch of our 2nd floor apartment. it is a perfectly clear day, and they both started yelling "dad what is that?". i looked to where they were pointing and observed a shiny metallic ball flying northeast, which would flash a bright neon red occasionally. it went out of our line of sight behind some pine trees about 100 yards from our location, and did not reappear on the other side. it was traveling quietly and very fast.
content.summary: Silver ball flying in a straight line, alternating red flashes of light, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
My two kids and i saw three seperate objects.. the two smaller ufos were shining white spheres.. the third larger object was composed of two spheres in an eight figure, one red the other white.
these were not balloons, and if they were they were the size of a small aircraft judging from the altitude, approx. 1000 feet.  they were definitely not hot air balloons with gondolas.  they moved in a triangle formation to the east, with the sun behind them. they should have been backlit but were shining white and red as though they were internally illuminated.
i noted the time, 12:40 pm est.. and duration.. approx 5 mins. the red and white object blinked out of sight after several minutes, so did one of the smaller white objects. the other simply moved out of sight toward the horizon.
the sky was clear blue with no clouds or haze, and the objects were easily defineable. a jet flew in the vicinity of the objects as they moved toward the east, the jet was fairly low moving northeasterly and could have been a small commercial jet.  it was larger in perspective and may have seen the objects as it was headed in their direction. it did not appear to be chasing them but just going in that direction.
what struck me the most was the smaller white objects that seemed to be in fofrmation with the larger one, all moving at the same speed and spaced equally apart.
content.summary: 3-4 circular objects in triangle formation flying over freedom parkway

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were driving south on in-58 heading towards loogootee. my fiance observed a strange red moon like object in the sky at about 20-30 from the ground to the southwest. it appeared to be and upside down waxing crescent moon phase (appearing like a very thin smiley face, cheshire cat like almost) and was not moving in the slightest. she told me "wow look at the moon" so i looked up and noticed what she was talking about but didn't think much of it. a couple minutes later we looked up to see the object again and it was no where to be found. we thought maybe there were some trees impeding our view, but there were not many trees ahead of us, and we also drove for a considerable amount of time without ever seeing it again. we also considered cloud coverage to be the reason for the disappearance only to look up and see nothing but stars in the sky. we looked around to see if it was possibly the moon and we could not locate it anywhere. does anyone know if the moon can cause this kind of phenomenon? or could this be a ufo siting?
content.summary: Moon like object observed in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
In may 1964 my father obtained a job working for bindex corp. at the kennedy space center.  at the time my family and i were living at the diplomat appartments, on the atlantic ocean cocoa beach.  that late evening i went down to the beach and had my binoculars with me just looking over the ocean n. e. and s. to my left or north i could see the cape canaveral pad all lite up for another gemini missile launch for some future date.  i focused my attention to the ocean right in front of me and the sun was just setting behind th banana river when i saw a helecoptor about a mile or two of shore out in front of me droping a capsul and practicing retreaving the capsul from the water as one of the neighbors told me it was standard practice.

as i watched the stars just start to come out that cold blue sky, the missile pads are well let to the north and patrick afb to my right is lit up as well.  i continued to watch the the helecoptor with it running lights on shinging down on the capsule crew below it, when above the helecoptor i saw an increadable fast light what i thought was a star at first or meator like brightness heading straight for the helecptor.  it was increadably fast and like a blink of an eye it was over the helecoptor an huge i would say at least a 100 ft and all of this is happning withen 30 minutes between sun set and dark.  i just watched with other apartment neighbors on the beach we just stood there stairing.  being new in the area i ask the guy next to me, was this some kind of air craft helping the helecoptor he looked and me and said not that he had ever saw.  

the helecoptor with capsul hanging below it and crew already in the coptor started evesave manuvers away from the bright round object.  no one said anything and i thought for sure it was going to crash into the helecoptor  because of how close it was and remember i'm watching this through my binoculars.  it was fantastic! at least i thought since i was 15 years old.  no sooner had the helecoptor started for cape canaveral when i looked to my right and saw two jets with full after burners on from patrick afb heading for the helecoptor with the bright ball of fire following it.  as fast as it took me to turn my attention back to the activity out in front of me, the jets were gaining on the bright ball of fire, and it took off straight up like a flash of lightning and the jets were climbing after it.  i was amazed at how fast that fire ball went up and away, it was like the jets were just being toyed with.  during the incident some one had gone and called patrick afb military up and as we started to leave the beach and not one person spoke up about what just happened. an mp vehicles from patrick afb pulled up and took statements from everyone who was watching the whole thing.  this type of incident happened over the years in coca beach many times and just before night launches the ball of fire appeared, all the way up from the gemini program to the saturn one "b" projects.  it is something many of us will never forget.
content.summary: Large round fire ball

content.detailedDescription:
In 1999 in september i  bought a new puppy dog and i was training him to  go outsite with his "bussiness". i was going out side to my back yard every 5-10 minutes. i do not remember exact time but when i opened x-time door, i saw a flying round object just above my neighbours houses, above the trees. it was metalic dark brown, no windows and at the bottom there were round white like a bulbs one to another. about 2 years ago i was watching the history channel and there was a program about ufo in new jersey, so when i saw the pictures on tv there were the same to the one i saw in 1999. so from about 2 years i am reading the articles about ufos arround the world.
the object that i saw was flying with no noise with same speed and the radius of it was about medium plane's lenght.
object flew over the park where there were a lot of children with parents and no one witnessed it , just me and my husband.
for the next 3 days i was looking in the local news papers for the article that possibly some one would see this object. but i found nothing.

i didn't report it to no one. i was affraid that no one would believe me. if i knew about mufon at that time i definitely would report it to you.
from 2 years now i look up more oftern but i didn't see any object till this time.
2 times i had a very fraitening dreams about ufo. i was so terrified in the dream that i can't explain it or i do not know the proper words to desribe the fear just look at those objects. and i saw very mean men in blue uniform like a soldiers but there were not us army but some kind unknown fearful-evil secret "organization". i fund later on davick icke web site very similar photo of a man in blue military look a like uniform and david desribed it as "secret military".

it is good that there are brave people -mufon that are searching for the truth. 
my deep feeling is that all these objects that people see they are made not for the good of humanity. people must be very aware of those objects and they must run away very fast from them with the prayers on their lips.
please, continue to do research as you do. 
it is nessesary to warn people about possible great danger that is coming sooner or later for the whole humanity.
please do not put my testimony in public. my english in not that good.
i do not have any proof for it. you can just add to your record because it is true what i wrote. i am very religious catholic and i would like to give this testimony to help to prove that these flying objects are not imagination or halucination-but they are real.

with a great respect to you,
may god bless you and guide you to find the truth, that possibly would save lifes and souls,
violetta kos
content.summary: Metalic dark brown cylinder, no windows, white like light bulbs at the bottom one next to other. no noise, flying very low just above the trees.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 6:50 p.M. the evening of jan.17,2010.,my wife was outside of our garage after walking the dog and invited me to see the planet jupiter and its close proximity to the moon.We stood in dark facing west.She  was explaining that a night or so before, the sliver of moonlight was even thinner and the planet was even closer.The moon was approx 40 degrees off the horizon in the southwestern sky and the planet was left of the moon at approx 10 o-clock.Both of us while looking in that direction saw an object appear [to the right of the moon]that could be at first thought called a "shooting star".We agree that it could be described as falling to the horizon for 2-3 seconds,the diameter of two  stars, and the brightness of an incandescent light fading to orange.Holding my thumb out at arms length over the moon,i would say it appeared at 1:o-clock and disappeared [dropped to the horizon]at 5:30 at approx. two hand widths to the right of the moon.We expected to hear a crash and it to be found between otsego mi, and lake michigan.
my wife's impression is that it didn't disappear as much as fade out and she detected a silhouette continuing to the horizon.I thought it was a re-entry capsule and the crescent light at the bottom was just like an artist rendition of a re-entry capsule.There was no trailing light or "tail".View time 3 seconds.
i assume we're not the only people that saw it.What ever it was.It was impressive.That's not to say that the new moon and jupiter aren't a great opening act.
content.summary: Husband and wife assume to witness shooting star while viewing jupiter

content.detailedDescription: Approx 2000 on jan 9 2010 stepped outside and looking to the west a white light traveling at the the same height and path as the usual flight path to seatac airport.Maybe 5000 feet if that. it accelerated at decelerated at intervals and whe it decelerated it almost completely stopped.  it did this approx 10 times. it stopped above us, at this time my son had came ouside. and also witnissed it. it cont to the east. when it seemed to reverse itself and cont where it was almost insantly. there wer no red or green lights , just the one light.The speed it was traveling was from  dead stop to about 3-400 mph  it was hard to tell. aprrox  5 miles south of mchord airforce base. hope someone can find radar of it.Lasted about 30 seconds
content.summary: White light accelerating and decelerating

content.detailedDescription: on about oct 21 2009. i was leaving for work at about 5:25 am. it was rather cool,and the sky was very clear. all of the stars lite up the morning sky. as usual i looked for some of the more common star formations. i easily spotted the big dipper. the problem was,there were what looked like two other stars right in the middle of what i would call the pot. i couldn't remember there being stars in the middle? not noticable anyway. if you held your hand out towards the stars. they seemed about 2 inches apart. then one of the,ok i have to say it! ufo,s moved very fast about another 2 inches from the other,and stopped. the first ufo moved very fast to about where the first had been. the first ufo moved again. this time at an angle away from the first move. the second ufo seemed to being trying to get close to the first. for again very quickly it moved to the location the other had been. then the first ufo took off very quickly increasing speed until it vanished. the second ufo took off as well following the first. until it's speed made it vanish as well. did anyone else see it? i'am 47,no mental problems,and work as a millwright.Let me know. thanks.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two bright star sized ufo,s. one seemed hunting the other.
